about_the_game:
There is a 50% chance that a card will be dropped every 5 floors.
1. Tyrannosaurus rex
2. Dragon hatchlings
3. Fire dragon cubs
4. Dragon Scale Guard
5. Fire Dragon King Yan Yi
6. Rogue Dragon
7. Frost Dragon King Crampon
8. Stegosaurus
9. "Dragon Knight"
10. Small slip head, sharp eye
detailed_description:
There is a 50% chance that a card will be dropped every 5 floors.
1. Tyrannosaurus rex
2. Dragon hatchlings
3. Fire dragon cubs
4. Dragon Scale Guard
5. Fire Dragon King Yan Yi

name: Dragon Call - Dragon Tower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7 64bit / Win 8 / Win 10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core i3 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460/Radeon HD 5800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: at will
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Win 7 64bit / Win 8 / Win 10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core i5 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960/Radeon HD 7900 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: at will

short_description: "Dragon Call" is a non P2W card game. In the ancient war, the demigods expelled the Dragon Legion, but the effects of the war will never disappear. For thousands of years, intruders often ravaged the land. Now the summoners rise, they can use the energy of the earth to summon various helpers.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
